item.title: Diogo Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love'
item.description: Rute Cardoso says it has been an "incredibly difficult time" after Jota's death in a car crash.

item.title: Brigitte Bardot: The blonde bombshell who revolutionised cinema in the 1950s
item.description: The cocktail of kittenish charm and continental sensuality who swept away the cinematic cobwebs of the 1950s.

item.title: In pictures: The life and career of Brigitte Bardot
item.description: The French actress redefined cinematic allure, captivating the world before championing animal rights.

item.title: New archbishop urged to scrap Â£100m fund over slavery links
item.description: A group of MPs and peers claims the funds can only legally be spent on churches and payment of clergy wages.

item.title: Two killed in Sweden as major storm sweeps across Nordic countries
item.description: Thousands of homes in parts of Finland, Sweden and Norway have been left without power.
